statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE machine_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, machine_id, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 50 AND sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE machine_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM sensor_data GROUP BY machine_id HAVING total_records > 100 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY AVG(value) DESC
SELECT machine_id, sensor_type, MAX(value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY machine_id, sensor_type
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY machine_id ASC, timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(id) FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING COUNT(id) > 5
SELECT id, machine_id, sensor_type, timestamp, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, location FROM machine_info WHERE last_maintenance_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM sensor_data;
SELECT machine_id, sensor_type, MAX(sensor_value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY machine_id, sensor_type ORDER BY machine_id DESC, sensor_type ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='Temperature' AND sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT machine_name, location, COUNT(*) FROM machine_info GROUP BY machine_name, location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT machine_name, location, last_maintenance_date FROM machine_info WHERE last_maintenance_date < DATE('2022-01-01') ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT machine_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE machine_id IN (SELECT machine_id FROM machine_info WHERE location='Factory A') ORDER BY sensor_value DESC
SELECT * FROM machine_data
SELECT machine_id, timestamp, value FROM machine_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT machine_id, sensor_id, value FROM machine_data WHERE value > 100
SELECT machine_name, location FROM machine_info
SELECT * FROM maintenance_log ORDER BY log_id ASC
SELECT * FROM machine_data WHERE sensor_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_name, location FROM machine_info WHERE machine_id = 5;
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM maintenance_log GROUP BY machine_id HAVING num_logs > 10;
SELECT * FROM machine_data INNER JOIN machine_info ON machine_data.machine_id = machine_info.machine_id WHERE location = 'Factory A';
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value, DATE(timestamp) AS date FROM machine_data GROUP BY date;
SELECT * FROM MachineData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(reading) FROM MachineData GROUP BY sensor_type
SELECT * FROM MachineData WHERE reading > 50
SELECT * FROM MachineData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature'
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM MachineData
SELECT * FROM MachineData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT machine_id, sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp, reading FROM MachineData WHERE sensor_type='temperature' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM MachineData WHERE sensor_id='e4c19cff-2dbe-4cd8-a62e-ad46f792fbc3' AND timestamp>'2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY reading DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(reading) AS avg_reading FROM MachineData GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING avg_reading > 50
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT machine_id) AS unique_machines FROM MachineData
SELECT * FROM machine_status WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT machine_id, sensor_id, sensor_value FROM machine_status ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, sensor_id, sensor_value FROM machine_status WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT machine_id, sensor_value FROM machine_status WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM machine_health WHERE temperature < 30;
SELECT * FROM machine_status;
SELECT machine_id, sensor_id, sensor_value, timestamp FROM machine_status WHERE sensor_value >= 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, sensor_id, sensor_value, timestamp FROM machine_status WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT machine_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM machine_location WHERE location_name LIKE '%Factory%' ORDER BY location_name;
SELECT machine_id, prediction, confidence_level FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 AND prediction = 'maintenance_required' ORDER BY confidence_level DESC;
